smell_analysis.justification: All diagrams in the provided model contain elements and content; no empty diagrams were found.
All use cases in the 'Laadimispunktide funktsionaalne allsüsteem' diagram are associated with actors either directly or through inclusion relationships.
No duplicate use case names associated with the same actor were found.
No distinct model elements with the same name were found within the same package. Visual repetitions (like 'Klassifikaator') refer to the same parent class.
The database schema appears normalized (3NF). No obvious denormalized data (redundant values without foreign keys) was detected across tables.
Use case naming is consistent, using the 'Verb + Noun' pattern (e.g., 'Tuvasta kasutaja', 'Lõpeta laadimispunkt').
All states in the 'Laadimispunkti seisundidiagramm' are reachable from the Start state and can transition to subsequent states or final states.
In the activity diagrams (Pages 3 and 4), all actions and decisions are reachable via the control flow.
All associations in the class and transformed diagrams include multiplicity indicators at both ends (e.g., 1, 0..*).
The Use Case diagram 'Laadimispunktide funktsionaalne allsüsteem' (Page 2) contains 11 central use case elements (ovals), which exceeds the threshold of 10.

On the 'Töötajate register' diagram (Page 9), the class 'Töötaja' has 6 visual connection lines (to Isik, Töötaja_roll, Töötaja_seisundi_liik, Laadimispunkt (x2), and itself). Similarly, on Page 10, 'Laadimispunkt' has 6 connections.

On the 'Laadimispunktide register (transformed)' diagram (Page 17), the distance between the table 'Laadimispunkti_pakett' and the related table 'Pakettide register::Pakett' (located at the far bottom right) is significantly more than twice the average distance between other related elements on the page.
All use cases and activity actions start with active verbs (e.g., 'Tuvasta', 'Vaata', 'Otsi', 'Vali').
No class, table, attribute, or use case names were found with 3 or fewer characters. Shortest names like 'Isik' or 'Riik' have 4 characters.
All class names start with an uppercase letter and are singular (e.g., 'Laadimispunkt', 'Töötaja').
All attribute and column names start with a lowercase letter (e.g., 'nimetus', 'kood', 'reg_aeg').
Table names in the transformed diagrams are singular (e.g., 'Isik', 'Laadimispunkt'), matching the class names.
No Hungarian notation or type prefixes (e.g., tbl_, str_) were found in element names.
